Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Cermak-Chinatown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Cermak-Chinatown.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute near Irving Park Blue Line
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Cicero, Montrose, Pulaski and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park Blue Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Cicero, Montrose, Pulaski and Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park Blue Line.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park Blue Line
ShortDescription: 54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Pulaski and Irving Park into the terminal due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54A North Cicero/Skokie Blvd Southbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Montrose, Pulaski and Irving Park into the terminal due to street blockage near Irving Park Blue Line.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.
